title: The Chosen
subTitle: Devout Christians discuss the divinity of Christ and spiritual leaders share valuable teachings from the Holy Bible to enlighten their followers.

title: Samarian
subTitle: The host interacts with various families in need, whose members are suffering from critical ailments, and lends them a helping hand.

title: Karunakontha
